message: Hi Bob! I'm offering this amazing product at a fair price. I believe it will be a great fit for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! However, I'm looking to spend less on this product. How about $10000?
I understand your position, Bob. However, the quality and value of this product are worth every penny. How about we meet in the middle at $13000? I believe this would be a fair price for both of us.
